text: I found it among his documents after he died, and do you know what the big prize is?

passages.fragment: I found it among his documents after he died , and
passages.full_quote: <used>I found it among his documents after he died, and</used> in fact, if you are interested, you will find it in a leather folder within the money chest

passages.fragment: he died , and do you know what
passages.full_quote: "The last leader gave me some advice just before <used>he died, and do you know what</used> it was"

passages.fragment: do you know what the big prize is
passages.full_quote: And there're silver crooks and belts with silver buckles and prizes of all kinds, Annagramma, but <used>do you know what the big prize is</used>
